name: Sudoku Cafe
description:
"Sudoku Cafe" is a logic-based puzzle game to fill a 9x9 grid with numbers(1 to 9).

From now on, let's enjoy a simple and puzzle game!
Once you start, you'll be hooked.

HOW TO PLAY
• The 9x9 playing board has the nine 3x3 subregions.
• Each of the nine 3x3 subregion contains all of the digits from 1 to 9 with no duplicate numbers.
• In the 9x9 playing board, each column and row contained the digits 1 to 9 with no duplicate numbers.
• If you make mistake more than 3 times, then you lose the opportunity to go the next level.

GAME LEVELS
• FLASH
• EASY
• NORMAL
• HARD
• EXPERT

Show your SUDOKU skill.

NOTES
• Enjoy the game with various devices.
• This app contains banner and interstitial ads.

Enjoy "Sudoku Cafe"
